mapper.insert: INSERT INTO top_ptnr_dept_bsc ( ptnr_id, ptnr_dept_nm, ptnr_dept_office_tel, ptnr_dept_office_fax, ptnr_dept_office_postcode, ptnr_dept_office_addr1, ptnr_dept_office_addr2, reg_date , del_date , del_state ) VALUES ( #{ptnr_id},#{ptnr_dept_nm},#{ptnr_dept_office_tel},#{ptnr_dept_office_fax}, #{ptnr_dept_office_postcode}, #{ptnr_dept_office_addr1}, #{ptnr_dept_office_addr2} ,unix_timestamp(now()), 0, 0 )
